targets.query:
from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement != "TestResultsAggregator" and r._measurement != "GroupData"))
 |> drop (columns : [ "Build", "Total Tests","Url", "_start", "_stop", "Group", "Name", "_field", "_measurement", "Duration", "Fail", "Pass", "Skip", "EstimatedDuration" , "_time", "_value"])
 |> group(columns : [ "Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> sort (columns: ["Last_Update"] , desc : false)
 |> group( columns: ["Status"])
 |> group()

from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r.Status != "NOT_FOUND") and r._measurement != "TestResultsAggregator" and r._measurement != "GroupData")
 |> drop (columns : [ "Build", "Total Tests","Url", "_start", "_stop", "Group", "Name", "_field", "_measurement", "Duration", "Fail", "Pass", "Skip", "EstimatedDuration"])
 |> group(columns : [ "Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> sort (columns: ["Last_Update"] , desc : false)
 |> last(column : "Last_Update")
 |> group( columns: ["_value"])
 |> count(column: "Status")

from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r.Status != "NOT_FOUND") and r._measurement != "TestResultsAggregator" and r._measurement != "GroupData")
 |> drop (columns : [ "Build", "Total Tests","Url", "_start", "_stop", "Group", "Name", "_field", "_measurement"])
 |> group(columns : [ "Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> sort (columns: ["Last_Update"] , desc : false)
 |> last(column : "Last_Update")
 |> group( columns: ["_value"])
 |> count(column: "Status")

from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement != "Aggregator"))
 |> group(columns: ["Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> sort (columns: ["_time"] , desc : false)
 |> last(column : "_time")
 |> drop (columns : [ "Jild", "Total Tests","Url",  "Group", "Name", "_field", "_measurement", "Duration", "Fail", "Pass", "Skip", "Time", "_time"])
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r.Status != "NOT_FOUND") )
 |> group()
 |> count(column: "Status")

from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement != "TestResultsAggregator" and r._measurement != "GroupData"))
 |> drop (columns : [ "Build", "Total Tests","Url", "_start", "_stop", "Group", "Name", "_field", "Duration", "Fail", "Pass", "Skip", "Time", "EstimatedDuration"])
 |> group(columns : [ "Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> sort (columns: ["Last_Update"] , desc : false)
 |> last(column : "Last_Update")
 |> group( columns: ["Status"])
 |> aggregateWindow (every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement != "TestResultsAggregator" and r._measurement != "GroupData"))
 |> drop (columns : [ "Build", "Total Tests","Url", "_start", "_stop", "Group", "Name", "_field", "_measurement", "Duration", "Status", "_value", "EstimatedDuration"])
 |> group(columns: ["Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> sort (columns: ["Last_Update"] , desc : false)
 |> drop (columns : ["Jenkins Job Name", "_time"])

from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r.Status != "NOT_FOUND") and r._measurement != "TestResultsAggregator" and r._measurement != "GroupData")
 |> drop (columns : [ "Build", "Total Tests","Url", "_start", "_stop", "Group", "Name", "_field", "Status", "Duration", "EstimatedDuration"])
 |> group(columns: ["Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> sort (columns: ["Last_Update"] , desc : false)
 |> last(column : "Last_Update")
 |> drop (columns : ["Jenkins Job Name", "_time", "Last_Update"])

from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement != "TestResultsAggregator" and r._measurement != "GroupData"))
 |> drop (columns : [ "Build", "Total Tests","Url", "_start", "_stop", "Group", "Name", "_field", "Status", "Duration", "EstimatedDuration"])
 |> group(columns: ["Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> sort (columns: ["Last_Update"] , desc : false)
 |> last(column : "Last_Update")
 |> drop (columns : ["Jenkins Job Name"])

from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement != "TestResultsAggregator" and r._measurement != "GroupData"))
 |> group(columns: ["Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> last(column: "_time")
 |> group()
 |> drop (columns : [ "Build", "Total Tests","Url", "_start", "_stop", "Group", "Name", "_field", "_value", "Status", "_measurement", "_time", "Duration", "EstimatedDuration"])

from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "TestResultsAggregator" ) )
 |> group()
 |> drop (columns : [ "_start", "_stop","_time", "AggregatorJobPercentage", "AggregatorTestPercentage", "_field", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement != "TestResultsAggregator" and r._measurement != "GroupData"))
 |> drop (columns : [ "Build", "Total Tests", "_start", "_stop", "Group", "_field", "_measurement", "EstimatedDuration", "Duration"])
 |> group(columns : [ "Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> sort (columns: ["Last_Update"] , desc : false)
 |> last(column : "Last_Update")
 |> group()

from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement != "TestResultsAggregator" and r._measurement != "GroupData"))
 |> drop (columns : [ "Build", "Total Tests", "_start", "_stop", "Group", "_field", "_measurement", "Duration", "EstimatedDuration"])
 |> group(columns : [ "Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> sort (columns: ["Last_Update"] , desc : false)

panels.title: Top 3 Jobs with High Failure Test Rate

targets.query:
from(bucket: "TestResultsAggregatorBucket")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement != "TestResultsAggregator" and r._measurement != "GroupData"))
 |> drop (columns : [ "Build", "Total Tests", "_start", "_stop", "Group", "_field", "_measurement", "EstimatedDuration", "Duration"])
 |> group(columns : [ "Jenkins Job Name"])
 |> sort (columns: ["Last_Update"] , desc : false)
 |> last(column : "Last_Update")
 |> group()
